title: Somebody halllllllllp
body:
I was in a ranked solo/duo with my husband like 2 hours ago. It lagged us both out and we attempted to reconnect for 30 minutes before giving up and logging out. We went to go back into League and since then... It wont log me in. 

It says:
"An error has occurred while logging in. Please try again later."

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 
I really hope we didn't take a loss because of this...........

Someone help :C SOS

replies.body: And my internet is fine. I've been watching Netflix on it and haven't had any issues........... -_-

It definitely sounds like there's an issue with your connection reaching our servers. Because Netflix's servers aren't located in the exact same geolocation as ours, it's still very likely that there's an issue along the way between your PC and our servers. As your first step, I recommend power cycling your network (unplug, leave it for 60 sec, then plug it back in). If that causes no change, then I'd recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all local network settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
Thank you so much!! It works now!!
